## jx get pipelines

Display one or many Pipelines

### Synopsis

Display one or many pipelines.

```
jx get pipelines [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # List all pipelines
  jx get pipeline
```

### Options

```

  -o, --output string   The output format such as 'yaml'
```
